# Symbolic Learning Model
- [Verb](Verb.qmd) tokens are used instead of [verb](Verb.qmd) types.
- No sharp discontinuities in the supply of regular and irregular [verb](Verb.qmd) tokens in 'parental speech'
- [Verb](Verb.qmd) tokens sampled randomly with replacement according to the Francis-Kucera frequency estimates for English verbs
